title: Smoked Trout Dip with Potato C’s & Salmon Roe
ingredients: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: 1. Peel and discard the skin from 8 ounces smoked trout. Flake into ½-inch pieces into a medium bowl, discarding any pin bones.
2. Add ¼ cup sour cream and ¼ cup mayonnaise. Stir until well combined and the trout breaks down into a tuna-salad-like texture.
3. Finely grate the zest of ½ lemon into the bowl and squeeze in the juice. Stir to combine.
4. Thinly slice ½ bunch chives. Stir in all but 1 teaspoon of them. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
5. Transfer to a serving bowl or plate. Garnish with the remaining chives and spoon 2 tablespoons salmon roe on top, if using.
